snippet: British authorities are circling the wagons around Standard Chartered bank, accused in New York of money laundering.
abstract: British authorities are circling the wagons around Standard Chartered bank, accused in New York of scheming with Iran to launder $250 billion, even though some stridently scored other British banks in recent scandals; they seem to be drawing a line against what many consider American overreaching; Standard Chartered has strongly rebutted the accusations.
lead_paragraph: British authorities are circling the wagons around Standard Chartered bank, accused in New York of money laundering.

headline.seo: Censure of Standard Chartered Draws Harrumphs in London
headline.main: In London, Censure of an Elite Bank Draws Harrumphs
headline.print_headline: In London, Censure of an Elite Bank Draws Harrumphs
